title: IRFC appoints Manoj Kumar Dubey as CEO and MD
description: Manoj Kumar Dubey has been appointed as CEO, Chairman, and Managing Director of Indian Railways Financial Corporation for five years. A distinguished IRAS officer from the 1993 batch, Dubey introduced significant digital and PPP initiatives. His tenure saw vast improvements in financial systems and corporate structure, promoting growth and innovation.
